tool.name: parallel map reads to reference
tool.command:
parallel_map_reads_to_reference.py -i $input_seqs_filepath -o parallel_map_reads_to_reference_output -r $refseqs_fp #if str($observation_metadata_fp) != 'None': -t $observation_metadata_fp #end if
#if str($assignment_method) != 'None': -m $assignment_method #end if
#if $evalue: -e $evalue #end if
#if $min_percent_id: -s $min_percent_id #end if
#if $max_diff: --max_diff=$max_diff #end if
#if $queryalnfract: --queryalnfract=$queryalnfract #end if
#if $targetalnfract: --targetalnfract=$targetalnfract #end if
#if $max_accepts: --max_accepts=$max_accepts #end if
#if $max_rejects: --max_rejects=$max_rejects #end if
#if $jobs_to_start: -O $jobs_to_start #end if
#if $retain_temp_files: -R #end if
#if $poll_directly: -T #end if
#if $suppress_polling: -W #end if
#if str($job_prefix): -X $job_prefix #end if
#if $seconds_to_sleep: -Z $seconds_to_sleep #end if ; compress_path.py -i parallel_map_reads_to_reference_output -o $output_dir

param.label: -t/--observation_metadata_fp: Path to observation metadata (e.g., taxonomy, EC, etc) [default: None]
param.name: observation_metadata_fp

param.label: -m/--assignment_method: Method for picking OTUs. Valid choices are: usearch blat bwa-short. [default: usearch]
param.name: assignment_method

param.label: -e/--evalue: Max e-value to consider a match [default: 1e-10]
param.name: evalue

param.label: -s/--min_percent_id: Min percent id to consider a match [default: 0.75]
param.name: min_percent_id

param.label: --max_diff: maxDiff to consider a match (applicable for -m bwa) -- see the aln section of "man bwa" for details [default (defined by bwa): 0.04]
param.name: max_diff

param.label: --queryalnfract: Min percent of the query seq that must match to consider a match (usearch only) [default: 0.35]
param.name: queryalnfract

param.label: --targetalnfract: Min percent of the target/reference seq that must match to consider a match (usearch only) [default: 0.0]
param.name: targetalnfract

param.label: -R/--retain_temp_files: retain temporary files after runs complete (useful for debugging) [default: False]
param.name: retain_temp_files

param.label: -T/--poll_directly: Poll directly for job completion rather than running poller as a separate job. If -T is specified this script will not return until all jobs have completed. [default: False]
param.name: poll_directly

param.label: -W/--suppress_polling: suppress polling of jobs and merging of results upon completion [default: False]
param.name: suppress_polling

param.label: -X/--job_prefix: job prefix [default: descriptive prefix + random chars]
param.name: job_prefix

param.label: -Z/--seconds_to_sleep: Number of seconds to sleep between checks for run completion when polling runs [default: 60]
param.name: seconds_to_sleep
